title: Did Brett Cavanaugh feel that persons with disabilities might have to give up electoral surgeries, including abortion?
subtitle: The defenders of the disabled community are largely opposed to Brett Cavanaugh, President Trump ' s candidate for the Supreme Court.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The United States Supreme Court candidate, Brett Cavanaugh, argued that persons with disabilities could be forced to perform voluntary surgeries, including abortions.
